headline: Analyst Explains Why TJX Companies (TJX) ‘Continues to Win’
summary: We recently published 10 Most Popular Analyst Calls to Watch This Week. The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) is one of the trending stocks. Dana Telsey from Telsey Advisors said during a program on CNBC that TJX is benefiting in the current retail environment because of its category diversification and partnerships. The analyst believes the company […]

headline: Is Analyst Optimism After Strong Results Shaping a New Investment Narrative for TJX Companies (TJX)?
summary: After reporting strong quarterly earnings and raising its full-year guidance, TJX Companies received favorable analyst coverage, including a new Buy rating from BTIG highlighting robust customer traffic and operational execution. An important insight is that recent share sales by one major institutional investor are seen as profit-taking rather than a sign of deteriorating fundamentals, with analysts continuing to reference TJX's consistent revenue growth and margin expansion. We’ll now...

headline: Costco & 3 More Retail Discount Stocks to Watch This Holiday Season
summary: Better pricing, effective inventory management and operational initiatives are likely to drive Retail-Discount Stores companies. COST, TJX, DG and DLTR look well placed.
